title: Head of Engineering
fitRationale:
- Digital Health + agentic AI focus; explicit preference for LLM/agentic experience.
- Works directly with CTO on engineering roadmap and product direction (fits platform/architecture leadership).
- Good if you want a smaller org role; less aligned with your large-enterprise scale unless scope is truly broad.
shortDescription:
